description: This file defines the AuthService class in an Angular application, responsible for handling user authentication processes such as login, logout, and token management. It interacts with local storage, routing, and API services to facilitate authentication workflows.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Service class that manages user authentication, including login, logout, token storage, and authentication status signals.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Initiates login process by posting credentials to backend API, stores received token in local storage, and updates authentication signal.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears token from local storage, updates authentication signal, and redirects to login page.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: Retrieves JWT token from local storage if available.

methods.name: hasToken
methods.description: Checks if a valid token exists in local storage.
